title: iPhone SE (2020) Review: everything you need
description: Apple's new iPhone SE has a 4.7-inch screen and it has the most powerful phone processor, the A13 Bionic. The camera is good in bright light but needs some work in low light. Overall at $399, this phone is one of the best values around. Plus, it should get iOS software updates for many years.   Read the full review here:   Vox Media has affiliate partnerships. These do not influence editorial content, though Vox Media may earn commissions for products purchased via affiliate links. For more information, see our ethics policy here:   Buy the iPhone SE from Apple:   Subscribe:  Subscribe to Verge Science:   Community guidelines:  Wallpapers from The Verge:
